price: Sesungguhnya Kami-lah yang menurunkan Al-Qur`ān dan sesungguhnya Kami benar-benar memeliharanya 793.
arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَزَّلۡنَا ٱلذِّكۡرَ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَحَٰفِظُونَ
footnotes: 793.  Ayat ini memberikan jaminan tentang kesucian dan kemurnian Al-Qur`ān selama-lamanya.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innā naḥnu nazzalnā al-dhik'ra wa-innā lahu laḥāfiẓūna
